lead_paragraph: A picture on Saturday with an article about Greg Peck, a horse trainer who prepared the favorite Muscle Hill for the Hambletonian, was published in error. The trotting colt he was shown with was Holiday Road, not Muscle Hill.
snippet: A picture on Saturday with an article about Greg Peck, a horse trainer who prepared the favorite Muscle Hill for the Hambletonian, was published in error. The trotting colt he was shown with was Holiday Road, not Muscle Hill.
